word:
His Religion Not a Mere Profession--His conversation, his influence, his refusal to yield to 
                                                                           375
self-gratification, must show that his religion was not a profession merely, but a daily, living connection with God. One goal he kept ever before him, and strove earnestly to reach--"the righteousness which is of God by faith." Philippians 3:9.--AA 314.
